title: Profile of Millennial travelers in the U.S. as of July 2016
yAxis: Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score
summary: This statistic shows the profile of generation x travelers in the united as of 2016 . generation x travelers were characterized most by their desire to explore with an average traveler psychographic intensity index score of 71.1 in the exploration hungry category . In 2015 , there was around 66 million people considered to be generation x in the united .

data.Profile Type: Wants the real destination not commercial tourism product
Connected during leisure travel and its planning

gold: This statistic shows the profile of Millennial travelers in the United States as of July 2016 . Millennial travelers were characterized most by their cultural interest with an average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score of 70.3 in this category . Millennial travelers were the generation group whose activity choices were most influenced by what was posted on social media .
